p: The green synthesized Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles were dissolved in methanol, and sonication was performed at 25–30 °C and then they were transferred to a copper grid. The copper grid was set aside for drying for 5–10 min, then TEM (FEI/Philips Tecnai 12 BioTWIN, Baltimore, MD, USA) was used to acquire TEM images with an acceleration voltage of 200 kV [ 37].
